name: get_by_latin_name
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool house_plants.
Tool description: This API provides a database of house plants, along with their description and information how to best take care of them (ideal temperature, light, etc.).

All proceeds go to charity (donated at the end of each month).
API description: Retrieves information about plants that match the provided Latin plant name using the House Plants API.

latin_name.description: The Latin name of the plant to search for. Defaults to 'philodendron'. This parameter accepts only [a-zA-Z] characters.
